hooks.command: filepath="$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '(\.env|\.github/workflows/|settings\.local\.json)$'; then echo 'BLOCK: Protected file - confirm with user first' >&2; exit 2; fi
filepath="$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; if [ "${filepath##*.}" = "cs" ]; then dotnet format --include "$filepath" --no-restore --verbosity quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi
